nycTheatreExcerpt: When Just In Time does conclude, it goes out with an exuberant bang, and though the vapor forms, it's clear that this is a show guaranteed to linger... whether it be the toe-tapping tunes, the memory of Groff's enthralling presence, or a certain thought, sure to cross your mind on the way out: "When can I see it again?
